bibl.title: Inscriptions from Amethyst Mines at Abu Diyeiba (Eastern Desert of Egypt).
bibl.note: Dédicaces ptolémaïques, à l'exception de la dernière, qui est peut-être romaine. - S.E.G. XVIII, 700-703; I. Pan 59-62.
Meredith David, Inscriptions from Amethyst Mines at Abu Diyeiba (Eastern Desert of Egypt).
Symbolae Raphaeli Taubenschlag dedicatae. II = Eos 48 (1956) fasc. 2, pp. 117-120 et 5 figg.
